captions.text:
To teach students history
through experience,

history teacher Ron Jones
began an experiment.
Within only 3 days,

the number of members of the Wave
increased from 30 to 200.
Fantastic Experiment II
On the fifth day of the experiment,

"As you know, our country
is in a state of crisis.

So we will spread our Wave Movement
to schools, companies, and hospitals
to save our country.

Now, you will see the founder of
the Wave and our leader."

Finally, the leader was
revealed in the video.

"I will always revere Germany.
It has been my calling since I was young.

I think of only Germany."
- Adolf Hitler

"Not one of you may want to admit that
you voluntarily came to this rally

like German people who were manipulated
and became followers."
The class experiment went over the line.
Name of experiment: The Third Wave

The 5-day-long experiment
at Cubberley High School, CA in 1967.

The history teacher
Ron Jones's confession.

"As the experiment proceeded,
I became part of the experiment.

I enjoyed students' uniform code
of behavior.

I was acting instinctively
as a dictator.
After the experiment ended,

We all kept silence
about the experiment."

Three years later, one day,
I ran into a male student.

"Mr. Jones,
do you remember the event?"

"Sure, it was one of the most frightening events
I experienced in the classroom.
And

It was also the genesis of a secret that
I and 200 students would sadly share."

"Does anyone want to be
not successful?"

You can become successful
and powerful through disciplines.

Shall we begin
a fantastic experiment?

title: EBS 클립뱅크(Clipbank) - 히틀러와 전체주의(Hitler and Totalitarianism)
